tool_description: IP Netblocks API gives you extensive information about IP ranges and IP address owners.
name: IP Netblocks
title: IP Netblocks

api_list.name: IP Netblock v2
api_list.description: Get exhaustive information on IP Range (v2)

optional_parameters.name: asn
optional_parameters.description: Get ranges by ASN (Autonomous System Number).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Max count of returned records. Acceptable values: 1 - 1000. Default: 100

optional_parameters.name: org
optional_parameters.description: Find IP Netblocks which have the specified search terms in their Netblock (netname, description, remarks), or Organisation (org.org, org.name, org.email, org.address) fields

optional_parameters.name: outputFormat
optional_parameters.description: Response output format. Acceptable values: XML or JSON. Defaults to JSON.

optional_parameters.name: mask
optional_parameters.description: Get ranges by CIDR. Acceptable values: 0 - 128 (0 - 32 for IPv4). Default: 128

optional_parameters.name: ip
optional_parameters.description: Get ranges by IPv4/IPv6 address or by CIDR depending on input
